title: Oh my god you deserve to be banned if you fucking first time a champ in ranked.
body: Like Jesus H. Christ what is your major malfunction to think "hurr durr this will go fine" THEY NEED to restrict champions to MASTERY 4 or higher in ranked.

replies.body: honestly bro , this is a great idea lol , but i guess you're fucked on a new account lol

Yeah no, Far as I am concerned, people like you deserve it. 
I am happy to first-time a champ in ranked, because people like you make this game unworthy of effort put in. 
This game is not worth that consideration, and certainly not worth any respect.
I only give half attention to my games, and with people like you, I look forward to first-timing many champs in ranked. Because your overinflated ego will be what loses the game, not someone stumbling over the ins and outs of a particular champions mechanics. 
So have fun, because "its just a game"
Isnt that what I am always being told? Maybe you should relax a bit more
I doubt you even know what Ranked is given you're not even level 30 and probably still new to the game, Spear Of Sojin Deadmans plate GRASP miss fortune. {{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Another pathetic "you dont play what everyone else plays so you must be new" 
Yeah come back when you dont try to dismiss my point because.....Meta. 

I have been playing long enough that I know how to play my champs, and yeah I do well enough. 
So yeah, try again kid.
you shouldnt belittle someone by calling them kid. Then talk about ego - its not a good thing lol

If the first defence he uses is "you arent playing what the rest of the sheep play, so you cant talk" then obviously he IS a kid. He wants to act like a kid, I will address him as one. 
I am not here to coddle his overinflated sense of self-importance, I am not his mother.

"I know my champions well enough" Ask anyone who plays the same champions as you and they'll show how vastly far apart you are compared to them.

Edit: Also, since you're SO SPECIAL for building items that make no sense on your champions, please go in depth about how you can make these "viable" and how they "work"

Please, tell me how special you are for not following meta. God forbid anyone follow whats actually good instead of doing things that make no sense and make you look stupid.
Do you have to be that person's mother to treat them with respect? I was taught to treat everyone equally.

Alright, let me make a clean slate here

First off, how....HOW and I MEAN how is it egotistical to suggest you LEARN your champ BEFORE playing them in ranked? If you first time in ranked, you're not only risking your OWN Lp, but having complete disregard for how your own TEAM feels.  How...in what way is that some form of an EGO? 

Rant boards are for when people go to let off steam, and I do admit saying "You deserve to be banned" was extreme. That WILL NOT, however, change my opinion. YOU SHOULDN'T disregard the fact THERE ARE OTHER PEOPLE TRYING TO WIN. 

Secondly, about your builds

The fact you call people who follow meta "sheep" shows you're the egotistical one, not me. I'm not good at the game, but I'll be damned if I let my own dignity be lost entirely. 

Meta is caused entirely by the people who ARE GOOD at the game, and everyone else wants to do as well as them to climb.

That has been the nature of this game for a VERY long time.

I apologize for assuming you were new, but honestly it's real freaking hard to tell the difference. 

You've admitted you've had multiple accounts before. That shows a sign you're probably-- PROBABLY toxic and get banned often. Stop that. If you get banned that often, you're being a hypocrite when calling someone out for being a "Kid" or "toxic". 

But let's say that you weren't banned and you've just "forgotten" your accounts. 

You're still the egotistical one.

"I know my champs well enough" 

No, you really don't.

If you KNEW your champs, you wouldn't think your unconditional builds are actually going to work. 

I would honestly not be surprised if you're Bronze. 

Now, I'm not ENTIRELY going to dismiss your opinions based on that fact. (I LOATHE saying "lol ur bronze xd")

I'm just saying, being at the bottom of the barrel, and being infamous for not seeing past your mistakes and the inability to climb from the least skilled elo, kind of loses any credibility of you "Being good at your champs".

I don't want to come off as rude, but if you come onto the category which is going to have ANGRY and IRRATIONAL people and encourage upfront like an arrogant dick that they're wrong and that you're "Glad" they get mad, you shouldn't expect not to get any form of flame back.

Please, understand how tilting it is for first timers in ranked to go 0/9 vs a mastery 7. Ranked is NO PLACE for you to hone your skills with characters you obviously don't know how to play. It's selfish and stupid to disregard the 4 other people with you. We're not robots.

Not to mention, this has absolutely nothing to do with an "Ego", it has to do you're deliberately putting all your teams at a disadvantage by being that one guy who for some reason plays a champion they have no idea works in R A N K E D.

Mastery hasnt been around long enough imo. There are probably 30+ champions i would have reached mastery 4 or 5 on already if they had mastery points since day 1. I can easily pull out a few champs that "appear" im first timing, in reality i have hundreds of games on. Especially true on smurf accounts.

If you honestly think a players going to perform well/shitty based on their profiles champ mastery every time you are just going to end up baiting the hell out of yourself.
I agree with Nevurwin. Mastery points doesn't mean someone is a god with that champion. I faced an enemy team that had a Leblanc with over a million mastery points. I still wrecked her.

Hell we need to have people with a mastery 2 or 3 just to use them in normal PVP - Almost every other game somebody tries out a champ first time and then get slaughtered and its so predictable but we don't want to dodge to wait even longer.
